DOC.brief_summary: In order reduce amount thiomersal vaccine , GSK Biologicals develop DTPw-HBV vaccine low thiomersal content ( Tritanrix™- HepB low thio ) . This vaccine use combination Hib low dose vaccine contain 2.5µg PRP antigen ( Hib 2.5 ) . The purpose study generate clinical data Tritanrix™-HepB low thio vaccine extemporaneously mixed Hib 2.5 vaccine . The control group receive Tritanrix™-HepB/Hiberix™ . Subjects received primary vaccination study 208108/091 ( double blind ) . Of subject 50 % randomised participate PRP challenge study ( 208108/092 ) ( open ) , subject invite participate booster study DTPWHBV=HIB2.5-093 ( 101477 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity , Safety & Reactogenicity GSK Vaccine Tritanrix™-HepB/Hib2.5 Compared GSK Vaccine Tritanrix™-HepB/Hiberix™
